original_text: The king mourns, the prince is wrapped in despair, and the hands of the people of the land are paralyzed by terror. According to their way I will do to them, and according to their judgments I will judge them, and they shall know that I am the Lord.”
korean_text: 왕은 애통하고 고관은 놀람을 옷 입듯 하며 주민의 손은 떨리리라 내가 그 행위대로 그들에게 갚고 그 죄악대로 그들을 심판하리니 내가 여호와인 줄을 그들이 알리라

sentences.original_text: the prince is wrapped in despair
and the hands of the people of the land are paralyzed by terror
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅 백성의 손은 공포로 마비되었다

sentences.original_text: According to their way I will do to them
and according to their judgments I will judge them
and they shall know that I am the Lord
